name: Watch your back: Magic academy
description:
"Watch your back: Magic academy" - is a top down shooter/slasher roguelite.

Action takes place at eastern academy of magic, almost immediately after "Watch your back: Heroes". 

Sorceress managed to bring her friend back. But he was not himself anymore.Trough unknown spell he took control over sorcerer's mind. And together they quickly took control over most part of the academy. But several high ranking council members were able to escape.They managed to create magic barrier around the facility. It wont stay forever, but you already can feel strange desires and crepiling voices around. You are trapped inside, and it's up to you to try to deal with this problem or surrender to your desires.

Take control over one of new heroes:
- cunning, power hungry shaman.
- rogue mage geomant.
- outlander necromant.

Game features:

- Character classes. Every hero has own style and abilities. 

- Customization. Customize your heroes appearance as you like.

- Explore procedural generated levels.

- Every failed "hero" will become a problem for a next one.

- Mods. You feel lack of customization? Or you you want to make few changes here and there? Inside you can find instruction to how to mod this game. 

If you like to share your impression, mod, or report a bug. 
Please join us on Discord.
